name: A Penguin goes to Hell
description:
This game was made for the MiniJam 69 (nice) which had the theme "hell".

You're a penguin trying to save a friend* deep inside the depths of hell. Traverse intricate** randomly generated dungeons trying to kill all evil. Use cards to apply special abilities to help you progress - but keep an eye out for the downsides.

*friend not included.
**not really all that intricate.

Controls

- GUI: Mouse only
- Movement: WASD / Analog Stick
- Shooting: Arrow Keys /  Mouse / Front buttons
- Card Inventory: E, I / Select
- Fullscreen: F11

Used development tools

- Engine: Godot 3.2.3
- Art: Krita and GIMP
- Sound: Audacity
- Music: LMMS
